content:
# The movement command has executed successfully, indicating that I am now positioned near the stone resource area.
# With my inventory containing 20 stones, I can now proceed to craft a stone furnace.

# Before crafting, I will ensure that I have the necessary materials to create the stone furnace. 
# The recipe for the stone furnace typically requires 5 stone units.

# I will now craft the stone furnace.
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Attempt to craft a stone furnace using the stones in my inventory.
